subject: HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
hello, unfortunately after receiving my HS Pro shifter today i downloaded
the most recent version of SIMSONN Manager and the 'Gear Shift' tab in the
Devices screen is not appearing. I live in the UK, im not sure if you guys
have released a new version of the software but i can only use my shifter
in sequential mode because of this. please resolve this because i am
getting a little frustrated...

thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi dckwods,  We will release a new software version today, which will officially add support for the HS Pro calibration page.  Please update the software and try it out.
